name: Slate
text: This memo is more about the appearance of action than actual solutions, to impress upon Trump supporters that distant protests are a threat to them, even if they really aren’t. https://t.co/DBKrHXB59X

name: Slate
text: Yes, your voting strategy should depend on your COVID risk. No, you shouldn’t wait until Election Day. Here’s how to make the right choice. https://t.co/tjpQJk10xC
